title: carrysp
author: carrysp
content: They took 100k from me cause I was using multiple account trading crypto.... Asked to keep the profit on 1 account or the loss during my trading, and they said no.... This was life-changing money for me but now is all gone. I am speechless....https://i.imgur.com/5p5hP3x.png

comments.body: Please use this and include everything you can:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=260073.0 Edit - TOS seems vague, but sounds like you violated the account policy by having more than one ofc ...  https://rollbit.com/terms-and-conditions

comments.author: Rollbit Razer
comments.body: Hey there,Our reply within the screenshot you shared summarises our thoughts for this case.However, I'm happy to add more context below for the action.We're generally happy with folks using multiple accounts as long as it's not to circumvent measures we have.You utilised at least 4 accounts to circumvent our Crypto Futures max position sizes. This was made clear via the ticket you opened.Please check the following modal which has to be acknowledged to trade on Rollbit:There was no loss incurred here, we simply removed profit generated by activity that we do not permit.Thanks,RazerRollbit.com

comments.author: carrysp
comments.body: what about my loses during the trading? why are you guys not accounting that? I lost 10k during trading and you guys took all the profits but not talk about the loses?

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: Quote from: carrysp on November 15, 2022, 09:12:16 PMwhat about my loses during the trading? why are you guys not accounting that? I lost 10k during trading and you guys took all the profits but not talk about the loses?  If you hadn't been trying to circumvent the system, you would have lost 0!!! I am 1 who does not agree with all the terms in most casinos ToS, but you clearly knew what you were doing was wrong, yet you continued to do it anyways and only complained once caught. There should be a penalty for you knowingly breaking the rules, so your losses are your penalty IMO.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: carrysp on November 15, 2022, 09:12:16 PMwhat about my loses during the trading? why are you guys not accounting that? I lost 10k during trading and you guys took all the profits but not talk about the loses?  The point is you knew what you were doing was wrong but then went ahead to create multiple accounts. By retaining the $100K, it deters you from ever creating new multiple accounts in their platform, since you now know that you will be doing it all in vain once you are caught.I think its a good counter measure to cheating by them.

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: Quote from: carrysp on November 15, 2022, 05:38:12 PMThey took 100k from me cause I was using multiple account trading crypto.... Asked to keep the profit on 1 account or the loss during my trading, and they said no.... This was life-changing money for me but now is all gone. I am speechless....It's sad to read your story, because most of the time I see accusations of scam against a casino and there's that doubt that maybe the accuser has a reason and the casino is guilty, but in your case you got greedy early, cheated and broke the TOS of the casino, when you didn't need to do that, you could have just one account, you would earn fairly and you would have your profit and little by little and with time your bankroll would be much bigger but you preferred to follow the path of greed and often the path of greed makes people cheat, what you can do is create an account at another casino and play without cheating, over time you can have a large bankroll. but you have to forget about cheating, see in this case, even with an account if you had respected the TOS and you hadn't cheated you would have something to withdraw, it's better to have little than nothing
